function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Inconsistent implementation of surveillance measures","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of formal quantitative synthesis for changes in work arrangements and worker education interventions","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Potential absence of publication bias can lead to skewed data and distancing","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of proper physical distancing and safety measures at work sites","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Risk of
